Text.text: Facilitate the efficient upload of large data files, ensuring seamless integration and automatic population of relevant information into the system's database.
Utilize a sophisticated feature to load products into a container with optimal space efficiency, displaying the results in real-time for precise analysis and decision-making.

Visualize and interact with the loaded products within a container using a detailed 3D view, enhancing spatial understanding and analysis. This enables an accurate representation of product placement and arrangement.
Present a formal report detailing the arrangement of products within the container, ensuring the customer understands the optimized loading plan as demonstrated in the simulation.

Table.noDataText: To start, set the relevant filters.
